news.title: Trump's latest tariffs U-turn is sparking a global market rally — and reviving talk of the 'TACO trade'
news.summary: "Donald Trump’s TACO bell has rung once again, much to the joy of financial markets," one investor said.

news.title: Spirit Airlines is in deal talks with investment firm Castlelake as struggling carrier seeks path forward
news.summary: Spirit Airlines is in talks with investment firm Castlelake for a potential takeover of the discount airline, CNBC has learned. The airline is in bankruptcy.

news.title: Jamie Dimon issues rare CEO criticism of Trump's immigration policy: 'I don’t like what I’m seeing'
news.summary: American CEOs have mostly avoided direct criticism of Trump's policies over the past year. American CEOs have largely avoided directly criticizing the president's policies.

news.title: Procter & Gamble earnings top estimates, but shrinking demand weighs on sales
news.summary: Procter & Gamble topped Wall Street's estimates for its quarterly earnings. But the company's revenue was weaker than expected. The company's quarterly results were released on Thursday.

news.title: Denmark open to 'Golden Dome' talks after Trump touts framework Greenland deal
news.summary: Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen welcomes U.S. President Donald Trump's Greenland pivot. Danish PM: "I think it's a very good thing that he is making this move"

news.title: China’s green-energy revolution is losing $60 billion a year. Why are investors still throwing money at it?
news.summary: China is praised for being a global alternative-enegy innovator. But its coal mining industry holds the real power. The country is home to some of the world's biggest coal mines.

news.title: This contrarian trader says silver has topped out — and this week’s action proves it
news.summary: Silver’s failure to respond as positively to rising geopolitical risk as gold this week is evidence of the trade becoming “tired” says Kevin Muir.

news.title: J.D. and Usha Vance are expecting their fourth kid. Most American parents can’t afford to have that many children.
news.summary: The typical family cannot afford a “modest yet adequate standard of living’ for four children. The vice president wants Americans to have more babies.

news.title: Yes, ‘DOGE’ did put our Social Security data at risk. Here’s what lawmakers are doing about it.
news.summary: Trump administration admits to security breaches that had been outlined in a whistleblower complaint. Trump administration admits security breaches in response to whistleblower complaint, White House says.

news.title: Lululemon’s founder lashes out at the company, saying it has ‘completely lost its way’
news.summary: Chip Wilson, who has been trying to reshape Lululemon’s board, said the company didn’t care about product development or quality.
